commandDescription: Splits object translations into various csv files
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input object translations. Default: '%s'
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for output object translations. Default: '%s'
inputFlagDescription: Specify an object translation file in input. Example: MyObject1-en_US
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
